name: Emmanuelle Beart
description:
In France, Emmanuelle Beart is known as one of the most accomplished actresses. She has been considered a leading lady of French cinema for over two decades. In America, Emmanuelle Beart is known for being Tom Cruise's love interest in the first Mission: Impossible.

Advantage: France.

In France, it's frowned upon to discuss a person's Jewishness. In America, we run this website, so we can proudly tell you that Emmanuelle's father, musician Guy Beart, was a Jew.

Advantage: America.

In France, Emanuelle Beart is a sex symbol, even in her fifties. She has appeared in risque photo pictorials and is known as a master of the nude scene. In America...

Advantage: France.
